Control.Text: Do you want to remove all the fights monitored untill now?
Control.Name: Text

Control.Text: The data collected on your fights will be shared on that channel
Control.Name: SubTitle

Control.Text: Last 5 fights, starting from the most recent
Control.Name: TextHelp

Control.Text: Drag and drop any stat that you want to keep track of into the "visible stats" rectangle.
Control.Name: Line 1

Control.Text: To remove a stat, simply drag it back into the "Untracked stats" box.
Control.Name: Line 2

Control.Text: The order of the visible boxes will be used to define the order of the columns into the main addon window.
Control.Name: Line 3

Control.Text: Treat a battleground or an arena as one fight
Control.Name: MergePvPFightsHelp

Control.Text: Treat the main spell and it's dot effect as an unique skill
Control.Name: MergeDotsHelp

Control.Text: To remove a profile write the profilename and click delete.
Control.Name: DeleteProfileLabel

Control.Text: Sorts the meter the other way around to see who's lowest on the meters
Control.Name: PlebModeHelp

Control.Text: The death recap will be shared on that channel
Control.Name: SubTitle
